revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Liberty Garden |image = [[File:Liberty Garden.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Liberty Garden. |tokens = 136,500 |location = Below Unova Route 20 }} '''Liberty Garden''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,703,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix || rowspan=6 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Sunkern.png|40px]] Sunkern |- | [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Wingull.png|40px]] Wingull |- | [[File:Pidove.png|40px]] Pidove |- | [[File:Sentret.png|40px]] Sentret |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Victini.png|40px]] Victini || rowspan=3|<center> 14,000,000 || rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Chimecho.png|40px]] Chimecho |- | [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra |}
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 1 || 18.74% || 18.04% || 16.97% || 15.16% |- | {{Bag2|Figy}} || 2 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Great Ball}} || 1 || 18.74% || 18.04% || 16.97% || 15.16% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Flame Plate}} || 1 || 2.01% || 2.61% || 3.52% || 5.05% |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || 1 || 2.01% || 2.61% || 3.52% || 5.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultra Ball}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.59% || 2.50% || 4.03% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Galar]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
